data.text: Gwa Mkulu Nguluwi, umhe heni hachi,
Gwa Mkulu Nguluwi, umhugajize na kunjeza,
Mazuwa gose silisemwa igano lya kwimilila lya hegwe,
Hambe ndilumbe hamwe na wanhu wadesi,
Ndanguhovuga moko ga heni kulajila ndahela nongwa,
kuno ndikwimba lwimbo lwa kuta malumbo,
Mkulu Nguluwi, nojezwa na ng'handa ya hegwe, honhu houlingikala,
Uleche kundumya hamwe na wawele na gehile,
wanhu wawele madito ga hewo ndo ga wihe mazuwa gose,
Ndangwima hali honhu hawele na kikala goya,
